text:
The following files can not be opened with eclipse (3.0.0 under linux):
src/webdav/server/org/apache/slide/webdav/logger/XHttpServletResponseFacade.java
src/webdav/server/org/apache/slide/webdav/logger/StatusHttpServletResponseWrapper.java
src/share/org/apache/slide/extractor/PropertyExtractor.java

The error message gives:
Character encoding problems.
This file is unreadable using the "UTF-8" character encoding.

For example in PropertyExtractor there is a 0xA0 character in lines 36 and 37,
which can't be read by eclipse.

Saving it with an other editor under UTF-8 fixes the problem (deletes this 
character).
creator: jaeger@our-isp.org
